title: Walter Johnson Lenox SGC 40 Finest known
author: sb1

posts.post_title: Walter Johnson Lenox SGC 40 Finest known
posts.post_content:
Walter Johnson Hands at Chest Lenox SGC 40. One of five total graded by SGC & PSA. This is tied for highest graded with one other, but clearly much nicer, scans of the other which sold in REA in 2006 are online. The offered card would have graded higher were it not for the diamond cut, which many Lenox backs have from this same sheet. 

For those that demand rarity and the absolute best this is for you.
Bumped with price added....rare combination in very nice condition.
Beautiful card, I'd imagine it's difficult to part with one like this. Good Luck with selling it!
